name: Epic Empire: A Hero's Quest
description:
With merciless bandits and deadly bosses around every corner, only the most fearless and strategic leader can bring honor to his empire. Arm your heroes, prepare for battle, and defend your town!

COLLECT AN ENDLESS SUPPLY OF WEAPONS AND ARMOR

Claim swords, steel, and shields from fallen opponents
Outfit your warriors in your favorite combinations of gear

BATTLE POWERFUL BOSSES IN REAL-TIME COMBAT

Encounter bandits, barbarians and more as you explore a mysterious land on the edge of civilization
Show no mercy as you put your fighting skills the test

STRENGTHEN YOUR ARMY
Forge your old gear and evolve your weapons into magnificent pieces of armor
Upgrade your characters and equipment to reach maximum power

BRING GLORY TO THE REALM
Take command of your military outpost and design the city of your dreams
Build your empire from the ground-up to create the strongest force in all the land

Supports Tablets!

Please note that Epic Empire is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you want to limit the ability to make in-app purchases, you may create a PIN in the Settings menu from within the Google Play Store.
